name: RAPdasArmas
description:
"RAP das Armas" is a single-player First-Person Shooter, in which the player has to eliminate a set of enemies with his laser burst gun to move to the next level.  The idea of the game is to be a fun, dynamic and captivating, due to the amount of action that can exist in each level, if you don't kill your enemies as fast as you can. Try it and tell us your opinion!

HOW TO PLAY

"WASD" to move your player and "MOUSE1" to shoot the gun, enjoy!
